response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be far beyond $10,000. However, I am willing to extend this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $15,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional value considering the benefits it brings. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 15000}
